casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Registrant G.H. In the Matter of Registrant G.A. (State of New Jersey - Movant) M-843/844 September Term 2018
081737 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for a continuation of the stay of the published opinion of the Superior Court, Appellate Division (M-843), and for a stay of all pending litigation involving the applicability of N.J.S.A. 2C:7-2(g) to offenders convicted before its enactment (M-844) are granted.
